{"id":926308438,"question_id":2725,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"11 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1680404753,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"212 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/926308438/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Mice and Cheese","memory":"106.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int miceAndCheese(vector<int>& reward1, vector<int>& reward2, int k) {\n        ios::sync_with_stdio(0); cin.tie(0); cout.tie(0);\n        int n = reward1.size();\n        int curk = 0, ans = 0;\n        vector<int> tmp0, tmp1;\n        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){\n            if(reward1[i] >= reward2[i]){\n                curk++, ans += reward1[i];\n                tmp0.push_back(reward1[i] - reward2[i]);\n            }\n            else{\n                ans += reward2[i];\n                tmp1.push_back(reward2[i] - reward1[i]);\n            }\n        }\n        sort(tmp0.begin(), tmp0.end());\n        sort(tmp1.begin(), tmp1.end());\n        cout << curk << endl;\n        for(auto i: tmp0) cout << i << ' '; cout << endl;\n        for(auto i: tmp1) cout << i << ' '; cout << endl;\n        for(int i = 0; i < tmp0.size() && i < curk - k; i++) ans -= tmp0[i], cout << ans << endl;\n        for(int i = 0; i < tmp1.size() && i < k - curk; i++) ans -= tmp1[i], cout <<  ' ' << ans << endl;\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"mice-and-cheese","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
